meanings.definition: Of or relating to metalworking or engraving
meanings.sent1: The toreutic tools gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: She admired the intricate toreutic designs on the jewelry.
meanings.sent3: The toreutic artist accidentally engraved their name on the wrong piece.
meanings.sent4: His toreutic skills were as sharp as the tools he used.
meanings.sent5: The toreutic patterns seemed to dance on the metal surface.

meanings.definition: The art or process of working metal into decorative objects
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed exquisite examples of toreutic art.
meanings.sent2: He studied toreutic to create beautiful sculptures.
meanings.sent3: The toreutic workshop was filled with the sound of hammers on metal.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for toreutic shone through in every piece she crafted.
meanings.sent5: The ancient toreutic techniques were passed down through generations.
